name: SUPER PONG (Moo Cow News)
description: It's calasic pong but... There is interntional bugs and very chaotic powers. The ball may go fast or slow. Same with your paddles... Fast or slow... Maybe the screen will go blury or maybe even nothing. This game is an endless amount of fun and I have enjoyed making it for the past week. This game is 2 player so invite your friend / family member to play with you.
